message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_BIRTHDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Foreign residency from date must not be on or before person's birth date.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_COMMENTS_SMALL
message.locale: Comments must be at least 3 characters long.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_COUNTRYCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Foreign residency country must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_REASONCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Foreign residency reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_XFV_DEATHDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Foreign residency from date must not be later than person's date of death.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_XFV_DEATHDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: Foreign residency to date must not be after person's date of death.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_TO_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Foreign residency to date must not be later than today's date.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_FROM_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Foreign residency from date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_FROM_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Foreign residency from date must not be later than today's date.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEFOREIGNRESIDENCY_XFV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: Foreign residency from date must not be later than the to date.
